games.title: Origin
games.description:
Collect the orbs to unlock the door and escape! Use the Arrow Keys or WASD to move and jump. To activate the door, collect all the black orbs.

In later levels, you'll be able to double jump. You can press W or UP twice to double jump. However, you only have a limited amount of chances to do this, indicated by the JUMP counter in the upper left corner of the screen.

Make sure you avoid the spikes!

games.title: Lord of the freaks
games.description:
Main Story

The protagonist finds themselves in a mysterious world called Freakland, where they meet the Worm-helper‚Äôna‚Äîa bizarre creature who reveals a shocking truth: to attain eternal happiness, they must endure a series of trials.
Fight Monsters

Explore the vast reaches of Freakland, battle hordes of monsters, and defeat sinister bosses, absorbing their power. Only then can you establish your dominance in this strange world.
Solve Puzzles

Unravel the secrets of Freakland using your wits and keen observation. Every discovery brings you closer to the truth‚Ä¶
Make Choices

Your decisions shape the hero‚Äôs fate. Which path to take? Should you pick up that mysterious artifact? How will you handle a tough moral dilemma? Every choice affects the story‚Äôs ending.
Upgrade Your Hero

Collect coins to enhance your abilities and discover rare artifacts. And if you‚Äôre lucky‚Äîyou might even gain a familiar, a loyal companion who could one day save your life.
games.howToPlayText:
CONTROL: 

PC Control:

    FORWARD - W ATTACK - LMB        
                                                               
     BACK - ATTACK - RMB        
                                                               
      LEFT - JUMP - SPACEBAR        
                                                           
      RIGHT - D    

Smartphone control:

    Move - left stick

    Jump - jump button

    Attack - Block Button

games.title: Find the Vampire
games.description:
Looking for an exciting vampire game? This is a casual 3D game where you act as a hunter to put an end to the vampire uprising. Your task is to identify the bloodsuckers among us, destroy them and free the city from the threat.

In this game, vampires disguise themselves as ordinary people, animals and even objects. Use unique exterminator kits and detectors to expose the hidden enemies. Unlock new areas, complete various levels and defeat the Vampire Lord to save the citizens.

KEY FEATURES:
- Vampire Exterminator Kits: Get new tools to fight the bloodsuckers.
- Search Among Us: Vampires can be anyone - from neighbors to trees.
- Rescue Citizens: Free people from vampire isolation.
- New Locations: Complete levels in different areas of the city.
- Vampire Tactics: Vampires become more cunning with each level.
- Story Levels: Each location reveals a unique story.
games.howToPlayText: The goal of the game is to identify and destroy all disguised vampires, save the citizens, defeat the Vampire Lord and stop the uprising, freeing the city from the threat.

games.title: A Long Way Home
games.description: A Long Way Home is a chilling survival horror game that plunges you into the role of a lost wanderer, desperately trying to find their way back home. Stranded in an eerie, ever-changing landscape, you must navigate through shadowy corridors and odd places while being relentlessly pursued by strange, otherworldly creatures. As reality begins to unravel, you'll encounter haunting visions and unsettling experiences that blur the line between fear and madness. Will you uncover the truth behind your nightmarish journey or succumb to the horrors lurking in the dark? Prepare for a gripping tale of survival, mystery, and terror in A Long Way Home.
games.howToPlayText:
You're a lost wanderer.

Explore the haunted world using Arrows or WASD.

Use your mouse to control the camera

Find hidden notes that expand the universe.

Collect all the hidden Foxes.

games.title: War V: Path of the Survivor!
games.description:
War Z: Path of the Survivor! - Story-driven first-person shooter. Go through the story, buy weapons, install various modules on them.

A first-person action shooter.

As a result of the man-made disaster, most of humanity was infected with a dangerous virus... which turns people into zombies

The survivors were forced to form paramilitary groups...

Who knows, maybe it's up to you to find the antidote to the virus and save humanity...

- The world of the zombie apocalypse.
- An exciting storyline.
- Hordes of zombies from the simplest to the mutated.
- A variety of weapons from the real world.
- Various weapon modules and a leveling system.

games.title: Check Wednesday Phone!
games.description:
Check Wednesday Phone! creepy-cute game inspired by the Netflix series. Read messages, solve mysteries, explore Nevermore‚Äôs secrets and play gothic mini‚Äëgames.

Enter Wednesday Addams' digital world in this dark, twisted game. Check emails from Nevermore students, change your gothic phone theme, play eerie mini‚Äëgames, and explore her secret-filled dorm. Earn coins doing tasks Wednesday would probably mock ‚Äî but you‚Äôll need them to unlock the next mystery.
games.howToPlayText: Tap Wednesday‚Äôs phone to begin. Read cryptic emails, change to delightfully gloomy wallpapers, earn coins, and explore her eerie room. Click on strange objects, crack passwords, and uncover secrets hidden in Nevermore. Watch for new messages‚Äîthey guide the story.

games.title: Escape Strange Girl‚Äôs House
games.description:
Escape Strange Girl‚Äôs House is a dark point-and-click adventure available on both web and Android.

You wake up in a locked, unfamiliar house. The windows are sealed, the doors are bolted, and it doesn‚Äôt take long to realize you‚Äôre not here by choice ‚Äî you‚Äôve been kidnapped. The only way forward is to explore, uncover clues, and piece together who lives here‚Ä¶ and why they‚Äôve trapped you.

Every object can hide a secret: a sofa may conceal something beneath its cushions, a flowerpot may hold a key, or a book on the shelf may reveal disturbing truths about the strange girl who owns this place. Interacting with the environment unlocks new paths, changes the protagonist‚Äôs perception, and pushes the story into darker territory.

As in every classic point-and-click adventure, you‚Äôll collect items and use them in clever ways to solve puzzles, repair devices, and access new rooms. A simple glass of water, a sharp knife, or a roll of tape could be the difference between staying trapped forever and finding your way to freedom.

The narrative unfolds gradually, shifting from calm exploration to mounting dread. What begins as a harmless search of a living room turns into a chilling discovery of obsessions, sinister secrets, and unsettling mannequins that seem far too lifelike.

Your ultimate goal is clear: escape the house before it‚Äôs too late. But as you progress, you‚Äôll uncover more about the girl‚Äôs twisted hobbies ‚Äî and the terrifying fate that might await you if you fail.

Will you outsmart her and unlock the final door to freedom, or become just another part of her dark collection?
games.howToPlayText: Explore the house by tapping on objects, collect useful items, combine them to solve puzzles, and uncover secrets that lead you closer to escaping.

games.title: Sins and Desires
games.description: ‚ÄúSins and Desires‚Äù is a captivating visual novel in the detective genre with romance elements. As detective Felicia, you travel to the village of West-Alben to uncover the mystery of aristocrat William‚Äôs disappearance. Experience an interactive story with branching choices, a relationship system that affects the ending, and romance routes with Albert, Felix, and Victor. The atmosphere of a dark mansion, a foggy lake, and a village full of secrets keeps you intrigued. Every choice matters - will you uncover the truth or fall into the shadows of West-Alben‚Äôs sins and desires?
games.howToPlayText:
In ‚ÄúSins and Desires‚Äù you play as detective Felicia, investigating the disappearance of an aristocrat in the village of West-Alben. This is a visual novel with a mystery story, romance, and branching choices.

How to play:
- Read the story and dialogues.
- Make choices that affect endings.
- Gather clues and question villagers.
- Unlock romance paths.
- Replay to discover all story branches.

Every choice matters. Explore different paths, uncover secrets, and experience the full mystery of West-Alben.

games.title: Locked in Grandma‚Äôs Basement 2: Revenge - Horror Escape
games.description:
Locked in Grandma‚Äôs Basement 2: Revenge ‚Äì Horror Escape is the chilling sequel to the cult classic point-and-click horror game.
After managing to escape once, Grandma has found you again ‚Äî and this time, she‚Äôs locked you in an even darker, more twisted place.
Explore eerie rooms, solve cryptic puzzles, and uncover cursed objects and grotesque clues.
Use your logic and courage to find tools, unlock hidden paths, and perform a disturbing ritual to escape.
Every item has a purpose, every detail tells a story ‚Äî and Grandma is always watching.
Will you manage to escape again, or will you become her next ritual offering?
Perfect for fans of horror, escape rooms, and point-and-click adventures.
games.howToPlayText:
This is a classic point-and-click adventure with a first-person view.
You don‚Äôt move around freely ‚Äî instead, you explore each scene from a fixed perspective.
Click on objects to examine them, collect useful items, and use them in the right places to solve puzzles and progress through the story.
Every interaction matters, so pay attention to details and think logically to escape.

games.title: The Road Home: Granny Escape
games.description:
The Road Home: Granny Escape is a terrifying 3D horror survival game where your only goal is to escape a haunted house filled with danger, puzzles, and fear. You're not here by accident ‚Äî Granny and Grandpa brought you here on purpose, and they won‚Äôt let you go easily.

üïØ The Story
Your trip home took a dark turn. While riding a bus through a remote forest, a massive tree crashed down onto the road. You stepped out to investigate‚Ä¶ and everything went black.

You wake up in a locked, eerie house. The windows are boarded up. The doors are sealed. And something is watching you. You soon realize the terrifying truth: you‚Äôve been kidnapped and trapped by an evil Granny and her mad husband.

This isn‚Äôt just a place ‚Äî it‚Äôs a prison designed to break you.

üéØ What You Must Do
-Explore the dark and haunted house
-Solve puzzles and unlock secret passages
-Craft useful items from the resources you find
-Avoid Granny and Grandpa ‚Äî they can hear your every move
-Survive deadly traps and unpredictable chases
-Make your way to freedom before it‚Äôs too late

‚öôÔ∏è Game Features
-A chilling 3D horror experience with immersive atmosphere
-Evil and intelligent enemies who react to sound and movement
-Multiple escape paths and secret endings
-A full crafting system: collect, combine, survive
-Puzzles, keys, locked rooms, and hidden objects
-A heavy dose of mental horror and psychological tension
-Every sound matters. Every choice counts.

‚ùóÔ∏è Not Just a Game ‚Äî A Nightmare
This isn‚Äôt just a scary house ‚Äî it‚Äôs a living nightmare. There‚Äôs evil in the walls, and death behind every corner. Will you outsmart your captors, or will fear consume you?

Use your brain, stay quiet, and find your way out‚Ä¶ if you still can.

Download The Road Home: Granny Escape ‚Äî and see if you have what it takes to survive the fear, escape the madness, and get back home.
games.howToPlayText:
WASD ‚Äî Move
C ‚Äî Crouch
Space ‚Äî Jump

The main goal is to escape from the old people's house. Find useful items and use them to your advantage.

Game description:

üîé Become a detective in a new adventure story based game! üîç

This part of Detective Max Mystery series is called ‚ÄúTHE DISAPPEARANCE OF MR.WINTERS‚Äù.

Detective Max has received a curious postcard from his neighbour, Benedict Winters. In that note he tells that he moved in a hurry and does not plan on returning. He then asks to find a small mystery box he had lost.

üîé Escape room + classic detective genre = sounds like fun! üîç


ESCAPE ROOM DETECTIVE GAMES

‚ÄîUse forensic science and the power of your grey sells
‚ÄîExamine the crime scene
‚ÄîCollect case evidence

‚ÄîEnjoy good story based detective games

games.title: Lost Adventure
games.description:
"Survivors of a mid-air crash find themselves in a mysterious land. The pilot, amidst crafting, mining, and solving puzzles, works tirelessly to save passengers stranded on separate islands in the wild grass. Can they conquer the challenges, reunite, and escape the enigmatic realm before the unknown dangers lurking in the wilderness engulf them all?"

Embark on a thrilling adventure after a plane crash strands you in a mysterious, wild land. As the pilot, you must gather resources from wreckage, craft tools, and navigate through the wild grass to rescue scattered passengers on small islands.

Explore ancient ruins, solve puzzles, and mine resources to unlock the secrets of this enigmatic realm. Encounter friendly and hostile creatures, and use your crafted weapons to survive. Communicate with other survivors, separated by streams and dense vegetation, through makeshift signals.

Your journey is a test of resilience and camaraderie. Each crafted item brings you closer to reuniting with your fellow survivors and discovering the way back home. Will you conquer the challenges of the wild grass and unveil the mysteries hidden within, or succumb to the unknown dangers that lurk in the shadows? The choice is yours in this gripping and immersive adventure!
games.howToPlayText:
Become a True Survivor!
Step into the role of a skilled pilot whose plane has crash-landed on an uncharted island‚Äîone that doesn‚Äôt exist on any Earth map. In this gripping RPG survival adventure, your mission is clear: find and rescue every passenger, brave the unknown, and uncover the island‚Äôs secrets.

Scavenge for resources, battle mysterious threats, and lead your group to safety. Rebuild what‚Äôs broken, forge alliances, and piece together a way off the island. Every choice matters, and survival depends on your courage, cunning, and determination.

Can you reunite your crew, outsmart the dangers, and escape the island that time forgot?

Desktop Controls:
W/‚Üë (Up Arrow): Move forward.
S/‚Üì (Down Arrow): Move backward.
A/‚Üê (Left Arrow): Move left.
D/‚Üí (Right Arrow): Move right.

Mobile Controls:
On-Screen Joystick: Move in all directions by dragging the joystick.

games.title: Block Puzzle Tropical Story
games.description:
Block Puzzle Tropical Story is a vibrant puzzle game that blends relaxing gameplay with a sense of island adventure. You‚Äôll connect blocks, solve clever challenges, and unlock stunning tropical locations. As you explore lush jungles and serene beaches, each level rewards you with stars and new areas, turning every puzzle into a step deeper into paradise.

The booster system will help you in difficult situations, and the well-thought-out mechanics allow both beginners and experienced players to enjoy the game.

Immerse yourself in the atmosphere of a tropical paradise with beautiful graphics, relaxing music, and fascinating gameplay! Each successfully completed challenge brings you closer to discovering new horizons, and accumulated stars become the key to the next chapters of this exciting journey.

A relaxing puzzle game where you connect blocks while traveling through picturesque tropical islands. Collect stars, unlock new locations, and immerse yourself in the resort atmosphere!
games.howToPlayText: Complete tasks in levels and open new locations. Hold and drag the left mouse button to drag and drop the blocks.

games.title: PopCats: Merge the cats!

games.howToPlayText:
- Connect identical seals into larger seals by clicking on the screen with your finger or mouse.
- To get to know a cat and find out its history, click on its image in the bottom panel.
- Make sure that the cats do not reach the top line, otherwise the game will end!
- You can change the next cat for watching ads.
- Use yarn to remove the interfering cat, and remember - the main thing here is not to miss!
- Collect points to take a leading position in the player rankings.
- Win by connecting the two biggest cats!

games.title: Mahjong Magic Islands
games.description: Join the enchanting adventure of Mahjong Magic Islands, a free online game that combines mahjong solitaire with exploration. Restore the islands'' magic by matching tiles and earning rewards while helping mythical beings revive their land. Enjoy this intriguing puzzle on your phone or computer.
games.howToPlayText:
Mahjong with history. Puzzle and adventure. Play and win! Connect tiles and collect prizes.

The wonderful world of the Magic Islands is in desparate need of magic to help restore the waning natural beauty of their ancient cities with a new wild energy. Tons of mythical creatures await your help throughout these scattered island. You are their only hope to be saved, fix these wonderful magic lands back to their former beauty!

Mahjong Magic Islands features classic mahjong solitaire in a uniquely original visual format. Collecting components for magic spells adds a fun layer to the gameplay, and meeting cute magical creatures to help out gives the varied levels of the game more significant depth.

* The mysterious worlds of the Magic Islands await discovery.
* Journey through the Mahjong Magic Islands solving fun brain teasers.
* Meet mysterious and mythical creatures, and help them on their way!
* Hunt down magic ingredients and make magic spells.
* Search and connect tiles.
* Mahjong Solitaire

You have to complete levels with classic mahjong solitaire mechanics. All the action takes place in a fairy-tale world inhabited by magical creatures who need your help!

games.title: Diamant: Match 3 Sky Story
games.description:
A fun adventure with match 3 elements. Create your own soaring city in the sky

An exciting adventure in the world of Diamant with match 3 elements.

- Create special combinations and summon powerful helpers who will help you clear any, even the most difficult field!
- Expand your island, study the blueprints and equip it with extraordinary buildings, create your own soaring city.
- 8 types of helper golems, and each has its own superpower, which in addition can be developed!
games.howToPlayText:
Line up three or more colorful gems to achieve your goals and solve challenging puzzles!

Prepare to face a variety of obstacles - from solid stone blockades and pesky bees to adorable spiders, sticky webs, rushing rivers, and more! Delve into ancient riddles, discover hidden blueprints, and protect your very own floating island - an enchanting haven you can grow and expand.

Earn valuable artifacts as you conquer levels and complete diverse quests to upgrade your town and decorate it with unique, eye-catching items.

Call upon helpful Golem companions on your journey and become a true hero in this magical Match-3 adventure!

–û–± –∏–≥—Ä–µ

games.title: Stalker 2033: The Path of the Survivor
games.description: Stalker 2033: The Path of the Survivor ‚Äì A 3D action shooter set in a post-apocalyptic world. Battle the undead, explore vast locations, uncover dark secrets, and fight to survive in a mysterious, deadly new reality.
games.howToPlayText:
Stalker 2033: The Path of the Survivor  - is an 3D action shooter set in a post-apocalyptic world.. Collect an arsenal of deadly weapons and fight for survival!


A huge location populated by a wide variety of inhabitants!

The quiet life of the middle lane is disrupted by a mysterious catastrophe ‚Äì an unknown phenomenon turns people into the living dead. The main character finds himself in the epicenter of the tragedy by accident: being away from the city, he learns about the beginning of the apocalypse just two weeks after it began.

Now he has to not only fight for survival in a new, cruel world, but also reveal its secrets. Collecting information bit by bit, he tries to understand the nature of the disaster and its impact on people..

Gameplay Features:

‚Ä¢ Exploring a post-apocalyptic world 
‚Ä¢ Interacting with the few survivors
‚Ä¢ Search for resources and create equipment
‚Ä¢ * Battles with different opponents
‚Ä¢ Thrilling zombie apocalypse storyline
‚Ä¢ Realistic arsenal of weapons

Immerse yourself in the exciting world of the post-apocalypse! Collect an arsenal of deadly weapons and fight for survival!

Control:
- WASD - movement,
- LSHIFT - switch to running,
- SPACE - jump.
- LEFT MOUSE BUTTON - shoot,
- RIGHT MOUSE BUTTON - aim,
- MOUSE WHEEL, Q - change weapons.
- T - inspect the weapons.
- R - reload.
- M - map.

games.title: Planet 404. Episode 1
games.description:
In this exciting puzzle platformer players embark on an amazing journey with Alice, a brave and curious explorer who finds herself stranded on a mysterious planet filled with secrets. Surrounded by enigmatic landscapes, this world is filled with puzzles that must be solved to uncover its mysteries.

 Each solution and obstacle overcome not only propels the player forward, but also reveals new chapters of Alice's adventure. The game's graphics are designed in a vibrant and colorful style, and the musical accompaniment creates an atmosphere of magic and mystery, immersing the player in an exciting world full of wonders and surprises.
games.howToPlayText:
On a computer:
To make the character run to the right, press the D button (or the right arrow) on the keyboard.
To make the character run to the left, press the A button (or the left arrow).
To jump, press the space bar (or the up arrow).

On a smartphone or tablet:
To make the character run to the right, tap the right arrow at the bottom of the screen.
To make the character run to the left, tap the left arrow.
To jump, tap the up arrow.
To fire a shot (which becomes available at a certain level), press the fire icon button.

games.title: Tile Farm Story
games.description: Join an exciting adventure in Tile Farm Story, a free online match-3 game featuring the adventurous Stone sisters. Explore unique locations, solve puzzles, and uncover family secrets. Enjoy this Mahjong-inspired experience on your phone or computer for a fun mix of challenge and entertainment.
games.howToPlayText:
The game "Tile Farm Story" is an exciting and challenging adventure that you won't be able to put down!
This chip collecting game will allow you to take a fresh look at the traditional rules of mahjong and test your Puzzle Master skills!

Hundreds of exciting levels, a rich history of the Stone sisters and colorful places that you will visit will help you relax and at the same time train your brain by solving many puzzles presented in the game. You won't notice how time flies!

Game Features:
- diverse and colorful locations in the most amazing corners of the world
- hundreds of exciting levels based on the mechanics of collecting chips
- many useful boosters to help you progress
- a rich plot with surprising twists and turns
- many unique animals with bright characters and funny animations
- an opportunity to train your thinking skills and relax in the company of an exciting game that combines mahjong traditions and new mechanics

The goal of the game is to find identical chips on the field and collect them. The collected chips are collected in the cells below. When there are 3 identical chips in the cells, they will be destroyed. If all the cells are filled, the game will fail.

To win, you must destroy all the chips on the playing field.

Control: touch/click.

Reflect on the missing elements and incorporate them in a single line!
When your brain out expectations are fulfilled, their dissatisfaction will fade, and a smile will grace your face!
Once again, their countenances will beam and they'll rejoice, as if they've received a windfall.
games.howToPlayText:
Analyze the Scene: Look at the image carefully and try to understand the situation. Each puzzle represents a small story or challenge.
Identify the Solution: Think about what‚Äôs missing or what needs to be uncovered to solve the problem.
Erase to Solve: Use your finger to erase a part of the image. The erased part will reveal the hidden solution or fix the problem in the scene.
Progress Through Levels: Complete each level to move on to the next challenge. The puzzles get more creative and tricky as you progress!
Enjoy the Fun: Each puzzle has a humorous or surprising twist, so don‚Äôt be afraid to experiment and try different approaches.

games.title: Wasteland Hunter: puzzle RPG
games.description:
Wasteland Hunter: puzzle RPG ‚Äî a unique combination of Tetris puzzle mechanics integrated into a turn-based combat system and RPG strategy set in a post-apocalyptic world.
What makes the game special:

Innovative Combat System: Players use Tetris blocks with equipment (bullets, health packs, shields, grenades) to create devastating combat combinations
Strategic Depth: Turn-based battles require tactical thinking ‚Äî players adapt block formations to enemy types and situations
Meta-Progression: Beyond combat, players rebuild and manage a survivor camp, rescue NPCs, and create unique combat figures from discovered blueprints
High Replayability: Map exploration, escalating difficulty, and diverse equipment ensure long-term engagement

Use mouse buttons  to play the game.

Mobile Controls
